resources.string:
Within the application, you can use the following features:\n
• real time traffic signs detection and recognition using the device\'s camera;\n
• choosing an image from the device storage space to detect and recognize traffic signs.\n
\n
Project realized for the diploma thesis. \n
Author: Enrico Gărăiman \n
Coordinators: Radu & Ioana Dogaru \n
\n
Faculty of Electronics, Telecommunications and Information Technology • Polytechnic University of Bucharest • year 2022.
